original_text: When he had been there a long time, Abimelech king of the Philistines looked out of a window and saw Isaac laughing with Rebekah his wife.
korean_text: 이삭이 거기 오래 거주하였더니 이삭이 그 아내 리브가를 껴안은 것을 블레셋 왕 아비멜렉이 창으로 내다본지라

sentences.original_text: When he had been there a long time
Abimelech king of the Philistines looked out of a window
and saw Isaac laughing with Rebekah his wife
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 아내 리브가와 함께 웃고 있는 이삭을 보았다
